¯\_(ツ)_/¯
obviously, the post has been deleted in no time by Facebook.. ù.u

oh... And in the popup message I've been intimated to not post things like that anymore and if I did, it was permaban -.-'

If their platforms are such good they don't need to worry about others XD and if.. maybe they should implement something better IMO u.u

Why taking revenge against a poor AI?! XD
By the way, I tried to talk with my google assistant on the phone but it continuously asks me how can be useful to me and I just keep saying that I don't want help, just to talk a little bit but nothing to do.. u.u

Actually, IMO, ZeroNet is cool for dynamic webpages.. instead IPFS is cool in static files distribution.. I would love people to use these 2 services like one ^^
I'm trying to jump start the thing with my blog, but it is pretty small, something bigger should be build, like [Play](/1PLAYgDQboKojowD3kwdb3CtWmWaokXvfp)

oh.. there's also a way to [merge torrents files into IPFS](https://discuss.ipfs.io/t/how-to-seed-torrents-from-ipfs/1191) so It could easily be adopted, just... it takes time ^^

yes @Klu9
but base on IPFS, correct me if I'm wrong.. but on ZeroNet, binary files, are transmitted as a whole and not small blocks...
then, IFS seems like discontinued..

I never used it @Klu9 .. but maybe it used to proxy the links... so you were able to see them even without the IPFS client ^^
But yeah, different zites are no longer maintained... maybe one day they will come back, who knows..
ZeroNet is cool for dynamic contents like Social Networks!!! Twitter and such suck in this ;D
